Class Target

  • Object
    • Entity
      • Target

  • public class Target
extends Entity
    Creates a target
    Author:
    Matej

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      boolean hit 
      private int SCORE 

      • Fields inherited from class Entity

        bounds, direction, pos, scale, texture

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Target(Texture texture, Vector2 pos, Vector2 direction, boolean hit)
      The constructor for a target takes in texture (for randomized texture inputs), position, direction and a hit boolean to identify when a target has been hit.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean checkEnd()
      Checks if entity is out of bounds, returns true/false
      int getScore()
      Returns the private final score of the target to add to player's score
      void update()
      The update method just increments the position based on direction
